{"name": "EMERGENCY RENTAL ASSISTANCE PROGRAM (ERAP) CABARRUS COUNTY DEPT OF HUMAN SERVICES", "alternate_name": "", "description": "SNAP BENEFITS 

AVAILABLE FOR CABARRUS COUNTY RESIDENTS ONLY.

DAYS/TIME: ONLINE 24-7 PHONE: 8-5PM, M-F

Requirements: Does not cover mortgages. Citizenship NOT required for applicant, but vendor/ landlord has to provide
SSN, TIN or DUNS number for payment.", "email": "", "url": "https://cabarruscounty.us/erap.cabarruscounty.us", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1303 South Cannon Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Kannapolis", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28083", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4766418, "longitude": -80.6089276}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 920-1400", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}]}
